description: Zed Business Layer - Facade: The method `Spryker\Zed\MessageBrokerAws\Business\MessageBrokerAwsFacade::send()()` is using an invalid return type `\Symfony\Component\Messenger\Envelope` which violates the rule "Every Facade should only return native types or transfer objects."
Bridges: Method `getCurrentStore()` must have `public function get<DomainEntity>Collection(<DomainEntity>CriteriaTransfer): <DomainEntity>CollectionTransfer` signature.
